name: Abysmal
description:
Please Use Unity WebGL Full Screen By Clicking The Blue Square ^

Abysmal is a sound puzzle / lock picking simulator game.

Controls: Mouse Click/Drag

Made for QaziJam June 2016.

The 2 themes I chose were 'Sound' and 'Evil Calender'.

Art (Paint.NET) and Models ( Blender) were made during the jam

Thanks to:

http://www.freesound.org/people/thanvannispen/soun...

for the stone sound effect.

What is QaziLove?
